entries.name: decode_www_form(str, enc=Encoding::UTF_8, separator: '&', use__charset_: false, isindex: false)
entries.desc: Decodes URL-encoded form data from given str.

entries.name: decode_www_form_component(str, enc=Encoding::UTF_8)
entries.desc: Decodes given str of URL-encoded form data.

entries.name: encode_www_form(enum, enc=nil)
entries.desc: Generates URL-encoded form data from given enum.

entries.name: encode_www_form_component(str, enc=nil)
entries.desc: Encodes given str to URL-encoded form data.

entries.name: join(*str)
entries.desc: String(s) to work with, will be converted to RFC3986 URIs before merging.

entries.name: regexp(schemes = nil)
entries.desc: Array of schemes. If given, resulting regexp matches to URIs whose scheme is one of the match_schemes.

entries.name: scheme_list()
entries.desc: Returns a Hash of the defined schemes.
